doc.title: Homeland Insecurity
doc.plot: A nightmare lived on the Internet. He's in the Middle East, she's home in the United States; they can see each other on their monitors and must type their dialogue. It's night for her, she goes to bed, he continues to monitor their house and is shocked to see a masked intruder. His wife is in danger, but what can he do? The intruder engages him via computer with menace and vague demands. What does the intruder want? What does the family have? The husband grows desperate knowing his daughter is in harm's way as well. Does he have any options?
